name: EyezOn
0:
”Alexa, Arm my Security System in Away mode.”
”Is my front door open?”
”What is the temperature in the garage?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows users with a DSC, Honeywell, or other Envisalerts enabled security system to access their panel, their zones, and the temperature of combination sensors, via the Alexa interface.

Users can ask the state of any zone on the security system in real-time, along with the state of the panel itself. Users can also opt-into control of the system allowing you to arm and disarm the system via your Alexa device.

An Envisalink or Envisalink SOLO is required along with a FREE EyezOn cloud account.

NOTE: For DSC and Honeywell panels you must enable QuickArming on your systems in order to ARM via Alexa. For release notes and a detailed description of how to enable this skill, please visit the EyeOn Forum.
